mapper.select: select a.open_id as 'openId' ,a.nick_name as 'nickName' ,a.name as 'name' ,a.mobile as 'mobile' ,b.publish_id as 'publishId' ,b.fetch_status as 'fetchStatus' from t_user a inner join t_user_share b on a.open_id = b.open_id and b.fetch_status = 1 and b.publish_id = #{publisId}

select a.publish_id as 'publishId' ,a.open_id as 'openId' ,a.fetch_status as 'fetchStatus' ,b.title as 'title' ,b.ticket_total as 'ticketTotal' ,b.ticket_sale as 'ticketSale' ,b.ticket_remain as 'ticketRemain' ,b.sub_user_num as 'subUserNum' ,c.nick_name as 'nickName' ,c.name as 'name' ,c.mobile as 'mobile' ,d.sub_user_num_act as 'subUserNumAct' from t_user_share a inner join t_publish b on a.publish_id = b.id inner join t_user c on a.open_id = c.open_id left join ( select a.parent_open_id,count(*) sub_user_num_act from t_user a group by a.parent_open_id ) d on a.open_id = d.parent_open_id where 1=1
and c.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{param.name},'%'))
and c.mobile like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{param.mobile},'%'))
